title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide both the correct answer and a valid justification, based on bonding type, equivalent to the following.

· Disagree. The reaction of a metal with a highly electronegative nonmetal (nitrogen) will produce an ionic bond. Nonpolar covalent bonds would be formed between nonmetal elements with similar electronegativities.

The response provides both the correct answer and a valid justification, based on bonding type, equivalent to the following.

· Disagree. The reaction of a metal with a highly electronegative nonmetal (nitrogen) will produce an ionic bond. Nonpolar covalent bonds would be formed between nonmetal elements with similar electronegativities.
